name: SCP - 049 (Playable Teaser)
description:
Hello again)

I thought for a long time how to improve my skills in creating games, and decided to take on this project.

I hope you like the idea and you will support me in further promoting this project.

I don't think you need to explain who is SCP - 049

You already know who it is

This game is about how they found him or not? ...

Thank you for staying with me

with love your Damnedbroke
